name: The Radio-Television Virus Radiation Centre
description:
Description

The Radio-Television Virus Radiation Centre (RTVRC) is a simulated text game centred around destroying a digital virus, which is inspired by my short experience as a Radio Broadcasting student at Seneca@York.

The game dives straight into the campus’ editing suites, allowing you create viral media from a selection of programs.

You’ll get a feel for the environment through coloured text and clickable options. Also, the clock adds a bit of strategy and dimension, so stay focused and have fun!
